highlights: Windows-based infrastructure for a hotel complex (80+ users; multiple VLAN segments).
Active Directory: user lifecycle, OUs, GPOs, logon scripts, roaming profiles, security policies; integrations with Exchange, file servers, internal apps.
Windows Server 2019/2022: AD DS, DNS, DHCP, Group Policy, Print Services; updates, backups, performance monitoring.
Networking: VLANs (guests, staff, admin, POS), L3 switches, site-to-site VPNs; firewall policies, internet access control, QoS, logging.
Designed multi-VLAN networks with distinct access (guests, admin, VoIP, CCTV).
Managed servers: DHCP, DNS, file/app servers, backups and monitoring.
Firewall log analysis and filtering to prevent attacks and unauthorized access.
Wi-Fi/LAN: switches, routers, APs, PoE devices; QoS tuning and throughput optimization.
Phone/online support for mesh network setup and device onboarding.
Eero networks: SSID, bridge/router modes, ISP integration and troubleshooting (latency, stability, coverage).
Helped connect smart devices (cameras, assistants, TVs) to Wi-Fi and improve coverage plans.
Clear documentation and CRM ticketing for traceable, high-quality support.
